speaker.whotheyare: Estelle Gibson helps people achieve personal freedom through financial literacy.
speaker.whylisten: With over 38 years of professional experience as a CPA, Estelle Gibson worked with individuals and companies ranging in size from small privately owned businesses to Fortune 500 companies across various industries. As a Financial, Business and ICF Certified Coach, she’s helped her clients break free from financial dependency by empowering them to move past their limiting beliefs and to implement powerful money strategies.
